name: Bitcoin Tycoon - Mining Simulation Game
description: Play as a new person who just get touched with the Virtual Currency area by starting mining in early 2014. Dig enough coins and expand your business, virtual currency exchange and complete trusts. Become the king of the whole bitcoin empire.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win7 Processor: I3 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: GTX750 Storage: 100 MB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Win10 Processor: I5 Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: GTX960 Storage: 150 MB available space
